data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 91,092 believers living in Villa Clara, Cuba.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Villa Clara, Cuba
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Villa Clara, Cuba to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Villa Clara, Cuba a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Villa Clara, Cuba. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Santa Clara
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Santa Clara, Villa Clara, Cuba.
Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Villa Clara, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Villa Clara, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, bless the state of Villa Clara with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

location.name: Villa Clara
location.cities_list: Santa Clara, Sagua la Grande, Placetas, Corralillo, Santo Domingo
location.cities_list_w_pop: Santa Clara (250,512), Sagua la Grande (62,073), Placetas (55,408), Corralillo (51,881), Santo Domingo (45,476)
